StatPREP is an initiative of the Mathematical Association of America (MAA), the American Statistical Association (ASA), and the Association of Mathematics Teachers in Two-Year Colleges (AMATYC). It is supported by the US National Science Foundation (grant DUE-1626337).
Teaching materials provided by StatPREP are available for use free of charge.
